file_content.text: A lot of firepower standing between us and their leader. They call him "the Exalted".
Teeseven told me you were headed into Breaktown, figured the rest for myself. Didn't think there was a scenic route to get here.
What in Scyva's name are you doing here? Couldn't trust us to get the job done?
I didn't stay ahead of you all of those years by trusting the wrong people.
No offense, Outlander. You, at least, I want to trust, so let me clue you in: the Exalted hates Knights. He won't say one word to Senya.
Look, I'm regular people. I speak their language. You want to make a deal with the Heralds, I'm your man.
They're delusional thugs. There's no deal to be made.
Koth, come on. Let's see what you can do. Senya, hang tight. We may still need you in there.
It's clear you two can't work together. Senya, you're with me. Koth, keep your ears open.
Arcann put him in charge here, but he's little more than a servant. And not a sane one.
